title: We are shipping with the wrong license for NetCDF.
description:
We are using a copy of the JDOM license BSD-like license.

NetCDF is an MIT-like license, and has it's own specific version.

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
comments.content:
Commit 1517560 from Mark Miller in branch 'dev/trunk'
[ https://svn.apache.org/r1517560 ]

SOLR-5187: We are shipping with the wrong license for NetCDF.
